1.8.9.1.0.0.1: Few bugfixes and last changes for 1.8.9.
1.8.9.1.0.0: The initial release of the newly combined grims mods.

1.9.2.1.3.7: Fix entities that were broken, fix server side issues, lots of config changes, and fix update url.
1.9.2.0.2.4: Properly fixes item colors, adds support for Flat Colored Blocks, and fix a small world gen issue.
1.9.2.0.0.2: Fixes a problem with modern furnaces. Also fixes compatibility issues with other mods blocks in decor.
1.9.2.0.0.0: Combines all parts mods into 1 mod and combine a lot of the logic. Lots of bugfixes and changes.

1.10.2.3.4.9.19: Add in Flat Item Frames which can be placed on all sides of blocks.
1.10.2.3.4.8.19: Added in the Fan block. This is similar to the Gravity Science blocks but more configurable.
1.10.2.3.4.7.19: Added in the Extruder that I updated a long time ago.
1.10.2.3.4.6.19: Made the Ultimate Fist more configurable so you can make more or less overpowered how you see fit.
1.10.2.3.4.6.18: Make the Ultimate Fist enchantable for even more Overpowered-ness.
1.10.2.3.4.6.17: Change slope collision to be configured to be smoother. Add in debug utility for viewing blocks collision boxes.
1.10.2.3.4.6.15: Some fixes to MultiTools not efficient on blocks. Add in support for JEI transfer for Workbench Upgrades. Built using JEI version 3.9.0.244
1.10.2.3.4.6.13: Added in super slopes. Everything uses the new colorizer system and has a few extra blocks.
1.10.2.3.4.4.13: Big refactoring. Huge changes to Instruction manual as well as fixes to buckets and changes to camo plate.
1.10.2.3.2.2.10: Add a config option for multitool durability. Add a home button to the manual
1.10.2.3.2.2.8: A huge amount of changes. Many of these change recipes as well as a overhaul of decor furniture.
1.10.2.3.0.0.1: Fix a world generation crash that would sometimes happen with Biomes O' Plenty. Also change version to actually be what the update is looking for.
1.10.2.3.0.0.0: Fix vanilla desert wells from spawning. Add a config option for workbench upgrades. Requires Forge 12.18.1.2039.
